author: TNN
title: Homeopathy: Pathak Hails Pioneer Of Homeopathy | Lucknow News - Times of India
text: Lucknow: Deputy chief minister Brajesh Pathak kicked off celebration of World Homeopathy Day at the Homeo Shakti 2024 event in Gomtinagar on Wednesday. The event marked the 269th birth anniversary of Samuel Hahnemann, widely regarded as the father of homeopathy. The event, led by Dr Umang Khanna, highlighted Hahnemann’s groundbreaking contributions to homeopathy.Pathak praised Hahnemann as pioneer of homeopathy and commended practitioners in UP for their dedication. Shyam Das Pabhu, priest from ISKCON temple Lucknow, stressed importance of mental health alongside physical well-being, urging balance between spiritual and physical care to combat stress and anxiety. Prof Abbas Mahdi, VC Era’s University, said there was need for further research to make homeopathic medicine more advanced.Dr Umang Khanna highlighted Hahnemann’s timeless influence on homeopathy.We also published the following articles recentlyWorld Health Day 2024: Understanding how physical health shapes mental wellbeingInvest in long-term health by recognizing the complex relationship between physical and mental well-being. Prioritize sleep, exercise, and nutrition for overall health. Mental health intertwined with physical health affects thoughts, actions, stress management, choices, and relationships, emphasizing the need to address mental health openly.109112266
